{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.01381v1", "title": "Interstellar extinction toward MWC 148", "summary": "We analyse high resolution optical spectra of MWC148 (optical counterpart of
the gamma-ray source HESS J0632+057) obtained at Observatoire de Haute Provence
and Rozhen Observatory. We measure equivalent widths of 7 diffuse interstellar
bands and estimate the interstellar extinction E_{B-V}=0.85 +/- 0.08.", "main_category": "astro-ph.SR", "categories": "astro-ph.SR,astro-ph.GA,astro-ph.HE", "published": "2025-04-02T05:50:16Z"}
